short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open or Copy multi links easily, just select it !
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 快速打开链接或复制链接和标题，直接在页面画框能就能选定链接

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenLinks is a browser plug-in that can help you quickly open multiple links or copy multiple links. It is simple and easy to use and can save a lot of time.
